Jennifer can you reproduce the problem on Linux? This doesn't have to be an SWT 
problem. The stack trace only indicates that an assertion failure occurred 
during executing an asyncExeced runnable.
The following two nightly builds run fine.

The situation is as Erich says; the trace just shows that an assertion failed 
in a runnable.  If this problem persists then you'll need to log a more 
specific report, so closing this one.
